description: This table contains the referrals linked to AP claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number indicating the order of referrals associated with this claim.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the referral associated with the claim.

columns.name: RFL_NOT_USED
columns.description: Stores 1 if the referral was not used during adjudication and is blank otherwise.

columns.name: PROC_LINES_ALLOWED
columns.description: Stores a list of service lines allowed to count against this referral as a comma-delimited list. The lines correspond to the values in AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS.LINE for the claim.

columns.name: RFL_ATTACH_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The referral attachment source category ID for the AP claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Adjudication Referral Matching


Manual


EDI Claim File
